issue_name: Multiple Vulnerabilities in SINEC NMS before V2.0

1.command: Update to V2.0 or later version
1.description: Siemens recommends updating SINEC NMS to version 2.0 or later to address the vulnerabilities.

1.command: Restrict access to the SNMP servers
1.description: Restrict access to the SNMP servers in the device network to mitigate CVE-2023-44315.

2.command: Ensure only trusted persons have access
2.description: Ensure that only trusted persons have access to the system and avoid the configuration of additional accounts to mitigate CVE-2022-30527.
